269011.<speed=0>ここでは お正月の絵馬を使って願い事を書いたり\nほかの人が書:
<speed=0>You can use your New Year Ema to write your
wish and hang it here, as well as view the
wishes that others have written.
<select>
Hang Ema
View Other's Emas
Cancel
<select_end>
<case 1>
<break>

<case 3>
<close>
<case_cancel>

269012.<speed=0>七夕の短冊を１枚使って 願い事を書きます。\nよろしいですか？:
<speed=0>I'll use one of those Tanabata strips to
write my wish... May I?<yesno><close>

269013.<speed=0>お正月の絵馬を１枚使って 願い事を書きます。\nよろしいですか:
<speed=0>This will consume one of your New Year Emas.
Proceed?<yesno><close>

269014.<speed=0>\n七夕の短冊がないため\n願い事を書くことが できません。\:
<speed=0>We don't have Tanabata strips, so we can't
write our wishes... You can buy Tanabata
strips at the tool store...<end>

269015.<speed=0>\nお正月の絵馬がないため\n願い事を書くことが できません。:
<speed=0>You don't have any New Year Emas. They can
be purchased at the nearby Item Shop.
<end>

269016.<speed=0>書くのをやめると 書いた願い事は\n元に戻りますが よろしいで:
<speed=0>If you stop now, whatever you
wrote won't be saved. Is this okay?<yesno><close>

269017.<speed=0>書くのをやめると 書いた願い事は\n元に戻りますが よろしいで:
<speed=0>If you stop now, whatever you
wrote won't be saved. Is this okay?<yesno><close>

269018.<speed=0>七夕の短冊に なにも書かれていません。\nなにかを書いてから:
<speed=0>There's nothing written on the Tanabata
paper... They write something on it and then
decorate it...<end>

269019.<speed=0>お正月の絵馬に なにも書かれていません。\nなにかを書いてから:
<speed=0>There is nothing written on this ema. Please
write something before hanging it up.
<end>

269020.<speed=0>願い事は この内容で よろしいですか？\n<yesno><cl: <speed=0>Are you sure this is what you want?<yesno><close>

269021.<speed=0>願い事は この内容で よろしいですか？\n<yesno><cl: <speed=0>Are you sure this is what you want?<yesno><close>

269022.<speed=0>願い事を書いた短冊を かざりつけました！\n<end>:
<speed=0>We hung up strips of paper with our wishes
written on them!<end>

269024.<speed=0>現在 見られる短冊は ありません。\n<end>:
